name: Spinculus
description:
This is my submission to Mix And GameJam!

You are a chick named Culus, and you must traverse the ever spinning stage to find your momma's golden egg. 

As part of the gamejam's theme, I attempted to recreate Sonic 1's special stage aspect in 3D. Passed a majority of gimmicks from it while adding a few to change it up a bit. 

The game only has one stage, and a very short one. 

Controls (XBOX Gamepad is highly recommended):

Left Stick - Move
A Button - Jump
Right Stick - View

Other Credits:

Sound Effects
-Kenney
-ChewingSound
-GameBurp
-FreeSound

Music
-"Happy Mandolin" by Media Right Productions
-"Acoustic Guitar 1" by Audionautix
